greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of Sum_{j=1..n} d(j)/n, where d = number of divisors function (A000005).
reference: M. Aigner and G. M. Ziegler, Proofs from The Book, Springer-Verlag, Berlin, 1999; see p. 135.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) a(n) = denominator(sum(j=1, n, numdiv(j))/n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 03 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 21 2001
